message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is closer to my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you halfway at $12,500. My maximum budget remains at $10,000. Would you be willing to reconsider your price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is just too low for me. How about we compromise at $11,500?  This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I am still unable to go beyond $10,000. It seems we are not able to reach an agreement. I will now consider purchasing the product from John.
